overview: As The Otherworldly Darkness Seeped Out Of The Cracks Of The Concrete, The Holes In The Walls, The Sky Above And Our Very Own Psyches, We Begin To Comprehend Just How Close The End Was Since The Day We Were Brought Into The World. Our Personal Epilogues Began The Moment We Took Our First Breath Of Blighted Air.
title: The Cruelty Of Memory
